metadata.name: Duet 1
metadata.description:
These 1/1 paintings are created using a palette of monochromatic colours, a combination of acrylic paint, pastels, and other mediums. The interplay of light and shadow and the subtleties of tone are important elements of the work, I strive to create dynamic and expressive pieces that capture the variations in textures, experimenting with different techniques and styles from physical to digital striking pieces.

Sing The Sorrow Collection  1/1
Title: Duet 1
Size: 40 x 30 cm | 11" x 15" (Physical)
Medium: image (JPG)
Dimensions: 3543 Ã— 4725 px
